name: Rock Pebble Sand
description:
What is life, if not the time passing us moment by moment, hour by hour?

But life is brief, and time, well, it flys, so fill it up wisely.

Here time is in your hands and there are many ways to spend it.

Just walk through the door and select which room you want to enter.

Made for Circuit Stream XR Game Jam

Credits:

3D art -Sonja Unger, Misha Samorodin

Programming - Jean Ward

Game Design - Misha Samorodin, Jean Ward

Narrative - Niva Kay

Original Music - Michelle Lugo
